ISSUE.TITLE: Double click at confirm button during checkout
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Not sure whether anyone notice that, when accidentally click twice at the confirm button, it will direct you to a empty cart screen, but I was expecting a payment screen. This may be a minor bug, but might affect the user experience. Source: http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/42164/double-click-at-confirm-button-during-checkout.aspx also http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8757963/avoiding-duplicate-form-submission-in-asp-net-mvc-by-clicking-submit-twice
